00034 /**
00035  * @brief Object for generating chip qc statistics from a 
00036  * Encapsulates all the work of generating chip qc stats 
00037  * from multiple cel files with different statistical algorithms
00038  */
00039 class ImputeEngine : public BaseEngine {
00040     public:
00041                         
00042                 virtual std::string getEngineName() { return ImputeEngine::EngineName(); }
00043                 static const std::string EngineName() { return "ImputeEngine"; }
00044 
00045                 /**
00046                 * Constructor
00047                 */
00048                 ImputeEngine();
00049                 
00050 
00051                 /**
00052                 * Destructor
00053                 */
00054                 ~ImputeEngine();
00055                 
00056 
00057                 /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00058                 class Reg : public EngineReg
00059                 {
00060                 public:
00061                         /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00062                         Reg() : EngineReg(ImputeEngine::EngineName())
00063                         {
00064                         }
00065 
00066                         /*! Creates an object.
00067                          * @return The object.
00068                          */
00069                         BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new ImputeEngine; }
00070                 };
00071 
00072                 /*! The one and only registration object. */
00073                 static Reg reg;
00074 
00075                 /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00076                  * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00077                  * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00078                  */
00079                 static ImputeEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00080 
00081     private:
00082         void checkOptionsImp();
00083         void runImp();
00084         void defineOptions();
00085         void defineStates();
00086                 void CheckChipType();
00087         void clear(); 
00088     
00089 };
